original_text: He led them through the deep water of the sea. They ran across like horses on open ground, and they did not fall.
korean_text: 그들을 깊음으로 인도하시되 광야에 있는 말 같이 넘어지지 않게 하신 이가 이제 어디 계시냐

sentences.original_text: He led them through the deep water of the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 바다의 깊은 물을 통해 인도했다

sentences.original_text: They ran across like horses on open ground
